content: p l y m o u t h y a r n® f595 d e s i g n s t u d i o f r e e w i t h y a r n p u r c h a s e kimera seamless baby cardigan to fit size 0-3 6-12 18-24 months approximate finished chest measurement 20 22 24 length 10 ½ 11 12 sleeve length 5 ½ 6 7 ½ materials kimera 3 3 3 50g balls color 16 orange/blue mix gauge 24 sts 32 row= 4 in st st on us size 4 3 5mm knitting needles 25 sts= 4 in beaded rib on us size 4 3 5mm needles needles/notions us size 4 3 5mm 24 circular needle and dpns 4 st markers m 4 st holders 5 buttons from dill photographed is #268628-18mm pattern is written for smallest size with larger sizes in parenthesis if only one number is given it applies to all sizes beaded rib worked flat multiple of 2 sts + 1 row 1 rs k all sts row 2 ws p1 *k1 p1 repeat from * across repeat these 2 row for pattern st beaded rib worked in the round multiple of 2 sts round 1 rs k all sts round 2 ws *k1 p1 repeat from * across repeat these 2 rnds for pattern st cardigan is worked from the bottom up in one piece the sleeves are worked separately in the round the sleeves are then joined to the body and is worked altogether to make the yoke body with circular needle co 117 127 139 sts work in beaded rib worked flat for 10 row beg working in st st when body measures 6 6 6 ½ from co edge end having worked a rs row divide fronts from back next row ws p27 30 33 sts left front bobble 2 sts p59 63 69 sts back bobble 2 sts p27 30 33 sts right front 27 30 33 sts for each front 59 63 69 sts for the back place all sts on a holder and set aside sleeve with dpns co 36 38 40 sts join in the round and pm work in beaded rib worked in the round for 10 rnds beg working in st st k every round when sleeve measures 1 ¾ increase 1 st before and after the m on next and following 4th 4th 6th round 6 times total 48 50 52 sts work even until sleeve measures 5 ½ 6 7 ½ from co edge ending 1 st before beg of round m on last round abbreviations beg= begin ning bobble= bind off co= cast on cont= continue dpns= double pointed needles increase= increase m= marker patt= pattern pm= place marker p = purl rem= remain ning repeat= repeat round=round rs= right side sl = slip ssk = slip 1 st as if to knit slip a second st as if to knit knit them together through
